description: Hope beyond hope. Despair will never prevail as long as you still live. Prisma Pink, Engage! Enhances your overall abilities slightly in a balanced fashion.
The iron will of humanity, the blade of light shall pierce through the dark. Altus Aqua, ready! Enhances your overall abilities slightly, favouring speed.
Justice! Strength! The weak will not be trampled anymore! Crush Cream, Transform! Enhances your overall abilities slightly, favouring strength.

description: When it comes to problems, you prefer using your guns to deal with them. Magic just makes it easier to solve them.
Magic beams? Transformations? No, your magic lies within infusing items. Subtle but just as effective.
In the face of despair, you never retreat! Even if your weapons break, your body and will prevails! While you have some minor enhancements, your stamina seems to be boundless.
